topics.body:
It's official the Ukranian rebels and Russia have a chronic case of stupidity.  Ukraine photographed the missile launchers moving back to Russia and with Russian military personal and Russian military equipment.

Putin. . . You have some serious fucking stupidity for this.  That's like a police station looking for a criminal carrying a rocket launcher with the person walking passed the police station carrying the rocket launcher in hand and giving thirty police officers a hello wave and walking away thinking that the police are that stupid to believe it's not them.

Again, Putin you're a dumb motherfucker.
